wikitext.*:
The '''Bunce family''' was a family of [[Hobbits]]. [[Mimosa Bunce]] is the only recorded member of the family.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref> 

However, according to [[Samwise Gamgee]]'s poem ''[[Perry-the-Winkle]]'', there was an "old [[Mrs. Bunce]]" living in [[Michel Delving]]; this character might have been based on an actual Hobbit, or just a character in the Hobbit folklore poetry.<ref>{{AB|Perry}}</ref>
